GravityChute
============

.. currentmodule:: transport.continuous.solid

.. autoclass:: GravityChute
   :members:
   :undoc-members:
   :show-inheritance:

Overview
--------

The ``GravityChute`` class models gravity-driven solid transport through chutes and hoppers with flow control considerations. This model incorporates bulk solid flow mechanics, flow rate prediction, and choking analysis for gravity-based material handling systems.

See Also
--------

* :doc:`PneumaticConveying` - Pneumatic solid transport
* :doc:`ConveyorBelt` - Mechanical belt conveying
* :doc:`ScrewFeeder` - Controlled solid feeding
